citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
- On 8/20/2024 a fennec fox named "Daphne" was given butorphanol from an expired bottle, although there was an
unexpired bottle of butorphanol on hand. Expired medications could have decreased efficacy or unpredictable effects, and
should not be used if an unexpired alternative is available. The facility must ensure that appropriate methods and
treatments are utilized on regulated animals.
Correct from 9/24/2024 onward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
- On 8/20/2024 a fennec fox named "Daphne" was given butorphanol from an expired bottle, although there was an 
unexpired bottle of butorphanol on hand. Expired medications could have decreased efficacy or unpredictable effects, and 
should not be used if an unexpired alternative is available. The facility must ensure that appropriate methods and 
treatments are utilized on regulated animals. 
Correct from 9/24/2024 onward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
